title: #25: The Trial of Oscar Pistorius for the Murder of Reeva Steenkamp
description:
Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti examine the inconsistencies and lies by Oscar Pistorius during his trial for the murder of Reeva Steenkamp.
